Number of cards to display at once: Number of cards to display at once
Choose whether to use the active file's: Choose whether to use the active file's folder or a selected folder
Choose a folder for Card Navigator: Choose a folder for Card Navigator
Choose the default sorting method for ca: Choose the default sorting method for cards
If enabled, all cards will have the same: If enabled, all cards will have the same height. If disabled, card height will adjust to content.
If enabled, card content will be rendere: If enabled, card content will be rendered as HTML.
Automatically center the active card whe: Automatically center the active card when opening the Card Navigator.
When enabled, dragging a card will inser: When enabled, dragging a card will insert the note content instead of a link.
toggleDisplayFor: Toggle to display or hide the {{name}} on cards
setFontSizeFor: Set the font size for the {{name}}
Maximum content length displayed on each: Maximum content length displayed on each card
Card Navigator provides the following fe: Card Navigator provides the following features that can be assigned keyboard shortcuts. You can set these up in Obsidian's Hotkeys settings:
To set up shortcuts for these actions, g: To set up shortcuts for these actions, go to Settings → Hotkeys and search for "Card Navigator". You can then assign your preferred key combinations for each action.
A preset with this name already exists. Please use the Update button to modify existing presets.
Select a preset created by the user to l: Select a preset created by the user to load the settings.
This button will revert the settings to: This button will revert the settings to their default values.
To open the context menu, set up a short: To open the context menu, set up a shortcut for the 'Open Card Context Menu' command in the Hotkeys section of Obsidian settings.
Toggle between limited and unlimited con: Toggle between limited and unlimited content length
Set the maximum content length displayed: Set the maximum content length displayed on each card when content length is limited.
Move up/left by one page of cards: Move up/left by one page of cards
Move down/right by one page of cards: Move down/right by one page of cards
Set focus to the Card Navigator: Set focus to the Card Navigator
Open the context menu for the focused ca: Open the context menu for the focused card
Note: Some shortcuts like arrow keys for: Note: Some shortcuts like arrow keys for navigation and Enter for opening cards are built-in and cannot be customized.
